# Hipervínculo — Digital Growth Agency

> Hipervínculo is a performance-driven digital marketing agency specializing in eCommerce growth, lead generation systems, and paid media management. Based in Miami, FL, serving clients across the Americas.

## About

Hipervínculo builds complete growth systems — not just campaigns. With 20+ years of experience, we help ambitious businesses scale profitably through data-driven strategies, conversion-focused infrastructure, and full-funnel paid media.

We are certified partners of Google Ads, Meta Ads, Shopify, Amazon, Helium 10, Elevar, MNTN, and Polar Analytics.

## Core Services

### Lead Generation Systems
We build complete inbound lead generation systems for service-based businesses: conversion-focused websites, landing pages aligned with search intent, lead intake flows (WhatsApp, call, forms), Google Ads targeting high-value demand, and tracking that measures real opportunities. Website builds start around $2,500. Monthly management starts at $1,000.

### eCommerce Growth Partners
Full-funnel paid media for Shopify brands across Meta Ads, Google Ads, TikTok Ads, and Amazon Ads. We optimize for Net ROAS (real profit), not vanity metrics. Engagement models include performance retainers (2.5x min Net ROAS target) and growth partnerships (5% of net Shopify sales).

### Conversion Website Development
Websites built as performance systems — designed around lead capture, structured for decision-making, built for speed and clarity, integrated with tracking and inbound flows. Not just pretty pages.

### Google Ads Management
Search, Shopping, Performance Max — managed with profit-first bidding strategies. We optimize for margin, not volume, with intent segmentation and accurate conversion tracking.

### Amazon Seller Services
Full-service Amazon account management: Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands, Sponsored Display, listing optimization, keyword research, pricing strategy, and TACOS optimization. Logistics and fulfillment not included.

### Tracking & Attribution
Server-side tracking (Elevar, GTM SS), GA4 implementation, Meta CAPI, Google Enhanced Conversions, and custom dashboards. Know exactly where your sales come from.

### Custom Enterprise Applications
Tailored web applications: inventory control, production management, operations dashboards, and business-specific tools.

### Brand Identity Manual Design
Professional brand identity systems: logo design, color palettes, typography, and usage guidelines for consistent brand presentation.

## Industries We Serve
- eCommerce / DTC brands (Shopify)
- Local service businesses (home services, legal, medical, real estate)
- B2B and SaaS companies
- Amazon sellers
- Professional services
